CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 5, 1958, pg. 6 reads: "2. Canyon Stone Company booth representatives, Mrs. Cyril Sacks and Jon Klasfeld, explain their product to Joann Tyler"
TitMainTitle: Representatives Cyril Sacks and Jon Klasfeld, showing product to Joann Tyler in Canyon Stone Company booth in Syria Mosque for the 1958 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
